item.title: Epidemiological update: Omicron variant of concern (VOC) – data as of 5 December 2021 (12.00)
item.description: As of 5 December and since 4 December 2021, 16 additional SARS-CoV-2 Omicron variant of concern (VOC) cases have been confirmed in the European Union and European Economic Area (EU/EEA), contributing to an overall total of 182 confirmed cases to date.
item.dc:creator: ECDC

item.title: Epidemiological update: Omicron variant of concern (VOC) – data as of 4 December 2021 (12.00)
item.description: As of 4 December and since 3 December 2021, 58 additional SARS-CoV-2 Omicron variant of concern (VOC) cases have been confirmed in the European Union and European Economic Area (EU/EEA), contributing to an overall total of 167 confirmed cases so far.
item.dc:creator: ECDC

item.title: Epidemiological update: Omicron variant of concern (VOC) – data as of 3 December 2021 (12.00)
item.description: As of 3 December and since 2 December 2021, 30 additional SARS-CoV-2 Omicron variant of concern (VOC) cases have been confirmed in the European Union and European Economic Area (EU/EEA), contributing to an overall total of 109 confirmed cases so far.
item.dc:creator: ECDC

item.title: Communicable disease threats report, 28 November-4 December 2021, week 48
item.description: This issue of the CDTR covers the period 28 November-4 December 2021 and includes updates on COVID-19, Ebola, and Influenza.
item.dc:creator: ECDC

item.title: Data on COVID-19 vaccination in the EU/EEA
item.description: The downloadable data files contain information on COVID-19 vaccination in the EU/EEA. The data are presented in the Vaccine Tracker and collected through The European Surveillance System (TESSy).
item.dc:creator: ECDC

item.title: Data on the daily number of new reported COVID-19 cases and deaths by EU/EEA country
item.description: The downloadable data file is updated daily and contains the latest available public data on COVID-19. Each row/entry contains the number of new cases and deaths reported per day and per country in the EU/EEA.
item.dc:creator: ECDC

item.title: Positivity rates, updated 2 December 2021
item.description: Maps in support of the Council Recommendation on a coordinated approach to travel measures in the EU
item.dc:creator: ECDC

item.title: Testing rates per 100 000 inhabitants, updated 2 December 2021
item.description: Maps in support of the Council Recommendation on a coordinated approach to travel measures in the EU
item.dc:creator: ECDC

item.title: 14-day case notification rate per 100 000 inhabitants, updated 2 December 2021
item.description: Maps in support of the Council Recommendation on a coordinated approach to travel measures in the EU
item.dc:creator: ECDC

item.title: Combined indicator: 14-day notification rate, testing rate and test positivity, updated 2 December 2021 (colour-blind friendly)
item.description: Maps in support of the Council Recommendation on a coordinated approach to travel measures in the EU
item.dc:creator: ECDC
